definitions.definition: Of, pertaining to, or being a language family spoken in northern Africa and southwest Asia , and including Berber , Chadic , Cushitic , Egyptian , Semitic , and possibly Omotic languages .

main_definition: Of, pertaining to, or being a language family spoken in northern Africa and southwest Asia , and including Berber , Chadic , Cushitic , Egyptian , Semitic , and possibly Omotic languages .
